item.description:
Last week to lit drop! Let's do what we can to help our local liberty candidates on their way to the Statehouse!!

We'll meet at the Hudson residence in Rochester at 9:30 to get our maps and a partner. After the lit drop, we'll meet for Lunch, paid for by the Candidates to say thanks!! We are targeting Milton, New Durham, and Middleton.
item.name: Campaign Lit Drop for Mincin and Forsythe on Seacoast
